entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
